1009830.name: Displacement Arcade Game Box - Soundtrack
1009830.description:
Soundtrack

Listen to all 14 music tracks from the games with the Steam Music Player!

Track list:
1. Plankton Wars
2. Heist Chase (Menu)
3. Heist Chase
4. TripTris
5. Beempire
6. Quick Shots
7. Inconvenient Puzzle
8. Fisherman's Fishy Fishes (Menu)
9. Fisherman's Fishy Fishes
10. Mini Snail Racer
11. Hammer Time
12. Kill the Developers
13. Cheat Menu
14. Trailer

Note: The soundtrack will be downloadable as MP3 files within the DLC and will be located in the same directory as the game files. To listen to it, open the music section and play the album Displacement Arcade Game Box OST in the Steam Music Player or (to access the music files) right-click Displacement Arcade Game Box in your Steam library and select "Properties". Then select the "Local Files" tab and click the "Browse Local Files" button.
1009830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
